name: Don't Die (Demo)
description:
Don't Die (Demo)

is a survival platformer where you help PanPan get out of a cave filled with unsuspecting traps & obstacles after an unfortunate accident. 

The goal is to get out without a scratch... or else... YOU START ALL OVER AGAIN. There are no check points. EVER. Speed runners BEWARE!

------

  • This is just a demo. 
  • A full game release TBA. 
  • More features to be added.
  • Feedbacks are greatly appreciated.
